fields.name: Rent:
fields.value: $20X where X is the number of Capsule Properties held by the Owner.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
Depends on the number of Capsule Properties held by the owner.
1. In the next turn, you will roll with one less d6, and the Owner will gain a single-use 'Extra D6 Next Turn' item.
2. For the next two turns, you will roll with one less d6 and the Owner will gain a single-use 'Extra D6 Next 2 Turns' item.
3. You will roll with one less d6 permanently, and the Owner will gain an unlimited-use 'Choose to roll with extra D6 next turn or not' item.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The Stop-in Effects don't apply if the victim's dice are already reduced to 1d6 or less.
